benak.tomas.crimemonitor.client

Class CrimeSummaryLoadingFragment

  • java.lang.Object
    • Fragment
      • benak.tomas.crimemonitor.client.CrimeDataLoadingFragment<CrimesSummary>
        • benak.tomas.crimemonitor.client.CrimeSummaryLoadingFragment

  • public class CrimeSummaryLoadingFragment
extends CrimeDataLoadingFragment<CrimesSummary>
    CrimeSummaryLoadingFragment is a fragment class used to load the crime summary for the crime summary activity.

    The crime data type loaded by this fragment is CrimesSummary.

    Author:
    Tom
    See Also:
    CrimeSummaryActivity

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      private class  CrimeSummaryLoadingFragment.CrimesSummaryAsyncTaskHandler
      CrimesSummaryAsyncTaskHandler is a helper class used to wrap the crime summary data loading task for this fragment.

    • Constructor Detail

      • CrimeSummaryLoadingFragment

        public CrimeSummaryLoadingFragment()
        The empty constructor.

        Used by the fragment manager for the fragment instantiation when the fragment is being restored.

      • CrimeSummaryLoadingFragment

        public CrimeSummaryLoadingFragment(java.net.URL serviceUrl,
                           int initialStartYear,
                           int initialStartMonth,
                           int initialEndYear,
                           int initialEndMonth)
        The constructor used to pass a service url and a crime data interval.
        Parameters:
        serviceUrl - the URL used as a base URL for the CrimeMonitor service endpoint method calls
        initialStartYear - the initial crime data interval year
        initialStartMonth - the initial crime data interval month
        initialEndYear - the terminal crime data interval year
        initialEndMonth - the terminal crime data interval month

    • Method Detail

      • createCrimeDataLoadingAsyncTaskHandler

        protected CrimeDataLoadingFragment.CrimeDataLoadingAsyncTaskHandler createCrimeDataLoadingAsyncTaskHandler(int startYear,
                                                                                               int startMonth,
                                                                                               int endYear,
                                                                                               int endMonth,
                                                                                               java.lang.String kodUtvaru,
                                                                                               Location location)
        Description copied from class: CrimeDataLoadingFragment
        Creates the crime data loading task wrapper.

        The wrapper is an instance of CrimeDataLoadingFragment.CrimeDataLoadingAsyncTaskHandler which is a helper class that encapsulates the asynchronous task created in CrimeDataLoadingFragment.createCrimeDataLoadingTask(int, int, int, int, java.lang.String). This helper objects uses this fragment's CrimeDataLoadingFragment.onCrimeDataLoaded(CrimeResultData, Location), CrimeDataLoadingFragment.onCrimeDataLoadingCancelled(int, int, int, int, java.lang.String), CrimeDataLoadingFragment.onCrimeDataLoadingError(int, int, int, int, java.lang.String, java.lang.Exception), CrimeDataLoadingFragment.onCrimeDataLoadingStarted(), CrimeDataLoadingFragment.onCrimeDataLoadingTaskCreated() and CrimeDataLoadingFragment.onCrimeEmptyDataLoaded(int, int, int, int, java.lang.String) protected callback methods to report it's results to this fragment.

        Specified by:
        createCrimeDataLoadingAsyncTaskHandler in class CrimeDataLoadingFragment<CrimesSummary>
        Parameters:
        startYear - the starting year of the crime data time interval
        startMonth - the starting month of the crime data time interval
        endYear - the ending year of the crime data time interval
        endMonth - the ending month of the crime data time interval
        kodUtvaru - the string representing the department code. It conforms to the regular expression [0-9]{6}.
        location - the Location instance with the current department code location
        Returns:
        CrimeDataLoadingAsyncTaskHandler instance of an asynchronous task handler, which encapsulates the data loading asynchronous task created with #createCrimeDataLoadingTask

      • createCrimeDataLoadingTask

        protected GetCrimeDataTask<CrimesSummary> createCrimeDataLoadingTask(int startYear,
                                                         int startMonth,
                                                         int endYear,
                                                         int endMonth,
                                                         java.lang.String kodUtvaru)
        Description copied from class: CrimeDataLoadingFragment
        Creates the crime data loading task instance.

        The crime data task is parametrized by the given crime data interval and the department code.

        Specified by:
        createCrimeDataLoadingTask in class CrimeDataLoadingFragment<CrimesSummary>
        Parameters:
        startYear - the starting year of the crime data time interval
        startMonth - the starting month of the crime data time interval
        endYear - the ending year of the crime data time interval
        endMonth - the ending month of the crime data time interval
        kodUtvaru - the string representing the department code. It conforms to the regular expression [0-9]{6}.
        Returns:
        the GetCrimeDataTask instance of an asynchronous task, which performs the actual data loading on a separate thread
